mapper.select: select m.menu_perms from t_sys_role as r left join t_sys_role_menu as rm on r.id = rm.role_id left join t_sys_menu as m on rm.menu_id = m.id where m.status = '1' and r.status = '1' and r.role_str = #{roleStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select m.menu_perms from t_sys_user as u left join t_sys_user_role as ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join t_sys_role as r on r.id = ur.role_id left join t_sys_role_menu as rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id left join t_sys_menu as m on m.id = rm.menu_id where m.status = '1' and r.status = '1' and u.id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select m.* from t_sys_user as u left join t_sys_user_role as ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join t_sys_role as r on r.id = ur.role_id left join t_sys_role_menu as rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id left join t_sys_menu as m on m.id = rm.menu_id where m.status = '1' and r.status = '1' and u.id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
